comments.maxTotalSize: Total JavaScript bundle size across all chunks
comments.maxInitialSize: Initial bundle loaded on first page load
comments.maxChunkSize: Maximum size for any single chunk (route or shared)
comments.routes: Per-route bundle size budgets for dynamic routes
comments.strictMode: If true, fail on any budget violation. If false, only fail on error threshold
comments.thresholds: warning = 90% of budget, error = 100% of budget
